U

Use - Class in game.commands.inventoryCommands
This class represents 'pouzit' command, which is used to use item from inventory
Use() - Constructor for class game.commands.inventoryCommands.Use
 
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.Item
This method represents ability of exact item that can change game
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.keepable.EnergyDrink
This method allows player use item to clear all obstacles from map, but he can also be damaged by chance
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.keepable.GoldenKey
This method allows player to unlock all doors in a room except the main class door
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.keepable.MagicPear
This method allows player to clear nearest teacher from map and add 1 to his marks, but he can be damaged by chance
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.keepable.Resistor
This method allows player to simply increase duration of all tasks 2x, but he can be damaged by chance
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.unkeepable.Chair
This method doesn't do anything, because player can't use it's ability
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.unkeepable.Desk
This method doesn't do anything, because player can't use it's ability
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.unkeepable.Door
This method represents entering the door by deleting player from his current room and placing near the door in next room
useAbility(Player, RandomGenerator) - Method in class game.items.unkeepable.Wall
This method doesn't do anything, because player can't use it's ability
